text:
Philippe Moureaux (12 April 1939 – 15 December 2018) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Etterbeek, Belgium. He was a professor at Université libre de Bruxelles. He was the first and third Minister-President of the French Community from 1981 to 1985 and again in 1988. He was a member of the Parti Socialiste.
Moureaux died on 15 December 2018 in Brussels, Belgium from cancer, aged 79.
